ValidationRule.description: When the eRelease Status is set to Approved, the default message must be replaces with checkin location and scheduled build.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( eRelease_Status__c , "Approved"), OR( ISBLANK(Checkin_Location__c), BEGINS( Checkin_Location__c , "The Release Manager will specify the checkin location for the fix and Scheduled Build to use for the checkin.")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must remove the default text in the Checkin Details field and specify the checkin location and scheduled build.
